id: Marvel heroes broke records and changed Hollywood
paragraph: By Frank Pallotta, CNNUpdated 5:01 PM ET, Mon November 12, 2018 Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.New York (CNN)Marvel founder and comic book titan Stan Lee died on Monday, leaving behind one of the most influential and important careers in pop culture history.© 2018 Cable News Network.
